Text: We need your helpHowdy We need your help Earlier this week a letter was sent to you asking you to renew your support for The Association of Former Students in Because of the time sensitivity of this request we wanted to make sure you received this message via email as well This year is almost over and The Association is just below our goal of raising six million dollars for Texas AM in We need your help to allow us to provide critical unrestricted funds to the University that directly support the students and former students of Texas AM To learn more about how The Association supports Aggies everywhere and to donate online by December st please visit wwwAggieNetworkcom With your support The Association has always met Texas AMs financial needs Your continued support in and beyond will ensure the traditions and spirit that make Texas AM so special to us all remain in tact Thank you and Gig em Matt Jennings Director of Annual Giving
